summary: An elderly dementia patient must decide whether to leave this world under his own conditions, before he loses his dignity, or give in to his loving family and nursing home roommates' appeals to fight on and risk losing it.
cast: Ernest Borgnine|Piper Laurie|Anne Meara|Doris Roberts|Richard Schiff|Cybill Shepherd|Sunkrish Bala|Amber Benson|Clay Bravo|Cameron Monaghan|Dale Waddington|Gabriel F. Bellotti|Kate Caffrey|Candace O'Donnell|Liz Rebert|Kevin Spangler|Allie Swartz|Michael Zinn
title: Luna de otoño
